# DAL Package

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(daltoolbox)
```


```{r}
x <- seq(0, 10, 0.25)
y <- sin(x)

plot(x, y)
lines(x, y)
```


```{r}
data <- ts_data(y)
tshead(data)
plot(data)
```


```{r}
data10 <- ts_data(y, 10)
tshead(data10)
```


```{r}
r1 <- data10[12,]
r1
```


```{r}
r2 <- data10[12:13,]
r2
```


```{r}
c1 <- data10[,1]
tshead(c1)
```


```{r}
c2 <- data10[,1:2]
tshead(c2)
```


```{r}
rc1 <- data10[12:13,1:2]
rc1
```


```{r}
rc2 <- data10[12,1:2]
rc2
```


```{r}
rc3 <- data10[12:13,1]
rc3
```


```{r}
rc4 <- data10[12,1]
rc4
```
